global.name: AI/ML Engineer
global.description: Design and develop artificial intelligence and machine learning systems
global.why_trending: AI revolution across all industries, massive investment in AI startups
global.future_outlook: Will be the most in-demand tech role of the decade
global.entry_requirements: Computer Science degree, strong math background

global.name: Cybersecurity Specialist
global.description: Protect organizations from cyber threats and data breaches
global.why_trending: Increasing cyber attacks, remote work security needs, regulatory requirements
global.future_outlook: Critical shortage of professionals, high job security

global.name: Space Technology Engineer
global.description: Develop spacecraft, satellites, and space exploration technologies
global.why_trending: Commercial space race, Mars missions, satellite internet expansion
global.future_outlook: New space economy creating thousands of jobs

global.name: Climate Data Analyst
global.description: Analyze climate data to support environmental decision-making
global.why_trending: Climate crisis urgency, ESG reporting requirements, green transition
global.future_outlook: Essential for climate adaptation and mitigation strategies
global.entry_requirements: Environmental Science, Statistics, or related degree

global.name: Quantum Computing Researcher
global.description: Research and develop quantum computing systems and algorithms
global.why_trending: Quantum computing breakthroughs, major tech company investments
global.entry_requirements: PhD in Physics, Computer Science, or Mathematics

global.name: Renewable Energy Engineer
global.description: Design and optimize renewable energy systems
global.why_trending: Global shift to clean energy, massive infrastructure investments
global.future_outlook: Critical for achieving net-zero emissions goals

global.name: Biotech Research Scientist
global.description: Develop new biotechnology solutions for medicine and agriculture
global.why_trending: Gene therapy advances, personalized medicine, aging population
global.future_outlook: Breakthrough treatments and life extension technologies
global.entry_requirements: PhD in Biology, Biochemistry, or related field

global.name: Digital Health Specialist
global.description: Implement and manage digital health technologies
global.why_trending: Post-pandemic digital health adoption, aging population
global.entry_requirements: Healthcare background + IT skills or Health Informatics degree

india.name: AI/ML Engineer
india.description: Design and develop AI/ML systems for Indian and global markets
india.why_trending: India's AI mission, startup ecosystem, global outsourcing demand
india.future_outlook: India to become global AI hub with millions of jobs
india.entry_requirements: B.Tech/M.Tech in CS/IT, strong programming skills
india.indian_context: Government's National AI Strategy creating massive opportunities

india.name: Cybersecurity Analyst
india.description: Protect Indian organizations from increasing cyber threats
india.why_trending: Digital India initiatives, increasing cyber attacks, data protection laws
india.future_outlook: Critical shortage with 3.5 million unfilled positions globally
india.indian_context: Personal Data Protection Bill creating compliance demand

india.name: Space Technology Engineer
india.description: Work on India's space missions and satellite technologies
india.why_trending: ISRO expansion, private space companies, Chandrayaan success
india.future_outlook: India's space economy to reach $50 billion by 2030
india.indian_context: India's space privatization opening new opportunities

india.name: Climate Tech Specialist
india.description: Develop climate solutions for India's environmental challenges
india.why_trending: India's net-zero commitment, climate adaptation needs, green finance
india.future_outlook: Essential for India's climate goals and sustainable development
india.indian_context: India's ambitious renewable energy and EV targets

india.name: Fintech Developer
india.description: Build digital payment and financial technology solutions
india.why_trending: UPI success, digital payments growth, financial inclusion drive
india.future_outlook: India's fintech market to reach $200 billion by 2030
india.entry_requirements: B.Tech in CS/IT, understanding of financial systems
india.indian_context: India leading global fintech innovation with UPI model

india.name: Healthcare Data Scientist
india.description: Analyze healthcare data to improve patient outcomes
india.why_trending: Digital health adoption, telemedicine growth, health data explosion
india.entry_requirements: Data Science background + healthcare domain knowledge
india.indian_context: Ayushman Bharat and digital health mission creating opportunities
